title: How to Install Linux Yellow Dog on Your Fat PS3

steps.headline: Turn on you ps3 and remember to back up anything you would like to keep.
Go into Setting and scroll down to system settings, and choose Format Utility.
Select Format Hard Disk, and confirm your selection twice.
steps.description: Remember: everything will be deleted once this is confirmed.

steps.headline: Pick "format allot 10GB to the Other OS".
steps.description: This would leave the rest of the space for your ps3 gaming needs.

steps.headline: Select quick format to speed things up.
steps.description:
When finished, it will restart the system. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/5\/52\/Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/5\/52\/Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-5.jpg\/v4-302px-Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-5.jpg.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":321,"bigWidth":"302","bigHeight":"211","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Insert the disk with the operation system you have just copied.
Go back to settings and system setting and scroll down to install other Os.
steps.description: It will start scanning and a file will pop up now hit Start and it will install real quick, now go back to system setting  and go to default system and change it to other Os to boot Linux up.

steps.headline: Plug in your USB keyboard and mouse once booted.
steps.description: Now the installation will begin a black screen will start up with some words hit enter once it will prompt "Now loading kernel …. It will take some time now"

steps.headline: Wait for installation to complete.
steps.description:
If you have any problems installing type in “Boot/game/OS that will go back to XMB for the ps3 “{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/c\/cb\/Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-9.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/c\/cb\/Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-9.jpg\/v4-295px-Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-9.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":262,"bigWidth":"295","bigHeight":"168","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Double click the install icon.
steps.description: It will set up your Linux, your user name, password and all the stuff you need to set up your computer/games system.

text:
Turn on you ps3 and remember to back up anything you would like to keep. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/5/5e/Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/5/5e/Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-1.jpg/v4-200px-Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":"200","bigHeight":"200","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Go into Setting and scroll down to system settings, and choose Format Utility. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/9/9c/Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/9/9c/Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-2.jpg/v4-350px-Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":354,"bigWidth":"350","bigHeight":"269","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Select Format Hard Disk, and confirm your selection twice. Remember: everything will be deleted once this is confirmed. Pick "format allot 10GB to the Other OS". This would leave the rest of the space for your ps3 gaming needs. Select quick format to speed things up. When finished, it will restart the system. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/5/52/Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/5/52/Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-5.jpg/v4-302px-Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-5.jpg.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":321,"bigWidth":"302","bigHeight":"211","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Insert the disk with the operation system you have just copied. Go back to settings and system setting and scroll down to install other Os. It will start scanning and a file will pop up now hit Start and it will install real quick, now go back to system setting and go to default system and change it to other Os to boot Linux up. Plug in your USB keyboard and mouse once booted. Now the installation will begin a black screen will start up with some words hit enter once it will prompt "Now loading kernel …. It will take some time now" Wait for installation to complete. If you have any problems installing type in “Boot/game/OS that will go back to XMB for the ps3 “{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/c/cb/Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-9.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/c/cb/Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-9.jpg/v4-295px-Install-Linux-Yellow-Dog-on-Your-Fat-PS3-Step-9.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":262,"bigWidth":"295","bigHeight":"168","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Double click the install icon. It will set up your Linux, your user name, password and all the stuff you need to set up your computer/games system.
